main.name: Zethu Zondi
main.description: Full Stack Developer with 5 years experience in the IT Field, started off in Technical Support and moved into Software Development
main.bio: My name is Zethu Zondi, I am a Full Stack Developer. Currently, I'm working at Yamby Holdings as a developer. A self-motivated individual who's also a great team player. I enjoy being challenged and engaged with projects that require me to work beyond my comfort and knowledge set, as I get to explore and learn new languages with different development techniques which are important for growth of any professional like me as well as the success of any organisation.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details

testimonials.text: Zethu has been a very hard working and dependable developer. She understands the business requirements and goes the extra mile to deliver it. Highly professional and great value add to any team.
testimonials.user: Nhlanhla Motau, Director at Yamby Holding

testimonials.text: I worked with Zethu at WBHO Construction for more than 1 year, I was her supervisor. I had the pleasure of working with her. Her dedication towards her work was outstanding and she always had positive attitude towards new learning. She is dedicated, self-motivated, trustworthy, independent and very capable. Zethu would be an asset to any Company.
testimonials.user: Matimba Hobyani, Intermediate Full Stack Developer at WBHO Construction.
